DPOs Lobbied: Liam Sinclair|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Mick Duff|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Cathal King|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Kieran Mahon|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Charlie O'Connor|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Louise Dunne|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Leah Whelan|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Patrick Pearse Holohan|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Baby Pereppadan|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Dermot Richardson|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Teresa Costello|Councillor|South Dublin County Council::Peter Kavanagh|Councillor|South Dublin County Council
Intended Results: Good planning is one cornerstone of every vibrant community. TCC are active in voicing a community view  for Tallaght in developing policy to shape our future in Tallaght.
Lobbying Activities:
A chara,

We understand the CEO report for the proposed variations to the County Dev Plan has issued, with a deadline date of 7th of June for councillor motions.

Before the long weekend, we, at Tallaght Community Council, would like to share our views as expressed to some variations proposed.

There are 7 we do not feel are in the best interests of the community. 

We would ask if you could please give some time to review the summary of our views. And if possible to support our queries as highlighted to some and rejections of others.

We are on the cusp of material changes in our county and our motivation is to get the best outcomes for our hometown of Tallaght.

Happy to pick up by Zoom or email should you have any element of our views to discuss further. 

Le meas,

Tallaght Community Council|Email|1
